org.jeo.raster

Class NoData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jeo.raster.NoData

  • public class NoData
extends Object
    Helper class for handling no data values in rasters.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double DEFAULT_TOLERANCE
      default precision for no data values.
      static NoData NONE
      No NoData, always returns input value.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NoData(double value, double tol) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static NoData create(Double value)
      Creates a new NoData helper with the default matching tolerance.
      static NoData create(Double value, Double tol)
      Creates a new NoData helper with the specified matching tolerance.
      Double valueOrNull(Double val)
      Determines if the specified value matches the nodata value.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        default precision for no data values.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static NoData create(Double value)
        Creates a new NoData helper with the default matching tolerance.
        See Also:
        #create(Double, Double)}

      • create

        public static NoData create(Double value,
            Double tol)
        Creates a new NoData helper with the specified matching tolerance.
        Parameters:
        value - The no data value. If this argument is null or NaN this method will create an no-op instance that never matches any value.

      • valueOrNull

        public Double valueOrNull(Double val)
        Determines if the specified value matches the nodata value.

        This method will return null if the value matches or the specified value is null. Otherwise it will return the original value.
